name: bungalow_app-backend
description: The wild oasis project backend nodejs express mongodb mongoose

scripts.start:dev: nodemon --trace-warnings --watch . --watch src --ignore node_modules --ignore logs --ignore .git --ignore uploads --ignore data --ext js,ts,json,mjs,cjs --delay 200ms --verbose server.js
scripts.startAuth:dev: nodemon --trace-warnings --watch . --watch src --ignore node_modules --ignore logs --ignore .git --ignore uploads --ignore data --ext js,ts,json,mjs,cjs --delay 200ms --verbose authServer.js

author: Onur Yilmaz
